reviewer 1: Age, Disease severity/disease history (ie past conditions or symptoms directly related to the disease of interest, eg history of venous thromboembolism in sickle cell disease), Performance score (ECOG PS, Karnofsky, Lansky, OMS, Ranson, ...), Past treatments for the disease of interest, Comorbidities and medical history (beside pathology/disease of interest in the comparison)
reviewer 2: Age, Disease severity/disease history (ie past conditions or symptoms directly related to the disease of interest, eg history of venous thromboembolism in sickle cell disease), Race/ethnicity, Performance score (ECOG PS, Karnofsky, Lansky, OMS, Ranson, ...), Past treatments for the disease of interest, Comorbidities and medical history (beside pathology/disease of interest in the comparison)
